api_list.name: Get all questions for your user
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all questions from login user!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://faq-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/questions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "faq-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get specific question for your user
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back specific question from login user!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://faq-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/questions/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "faq-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://faq-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/questions/{questionid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "faq-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all questions for your user with categories
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all questions from login user!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://faq-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/questions?include=categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "faq-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
